QuestData.Title: Ghislania
QuestData.Description: I own a couple gladiators that I put into competitions around Kalimdor. You can see most of them chained up around here... we were lucky to rein these ones in after the cart broke down.$b$bGhislania, that naga over there... she's lost her last three fights. She could use a tune-up, or maybe just a little bit of thrashing. Go challenge her, I'll bet even YOU are stronger than she is.
QuestData.RewardText: I watched you fight out there. How long you been a $c?$b$bYou're alright, kid.
